thread.section_title: PRO Import Tuners.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PRO Import Tuners.com | proimporttuners.com
thread.title: C.B.C
thread.title_full: PRO Import Tuners.com reviewed by C.B.C

author: C.B.C
title: C.B.C
text: Received a notice after work that issue was present in the order. Being in a latter time zone, The shop had already closed. So I went and called my bank because I was worried about losing money. Informed that funds were made avail and wait time on the next business day was the advice. Called the following Monday and the service representative at the time informed that Said company was backloged on intended part. Recommendations were made and I picked out an alternative I had in mind. Because of the trouble, I was given a discount on top of a current discount period. Solid work. I recommend the site to a friend and told him the ordeal. He too was blown away. Will definely return to this company.
